attributes.action: Stop harassment of British soldiers by IHAT and legal aid funded lawyers
attributes.background: Brave servicemen are being subjected to intolerable harassment from ambulance chasing lawyers funded by legal aid, and from the government body, the Iraq Historic Allegations Team (IHAT). These men served their country and many were mentally and phyisically injured. The government must end this now.

rejection.details:
If you would like the Iraq Historical Allegations Team to be abolished, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118038

If you would like British troops to have immunity from prosecution, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/117448

If you would like the eligibility criteria for legal aid to be changed, you could start a petition calling specifically for the change that you would like to see.
